content: this design has lots of fine texture and opportunities for playing with colour it is the june 2023 square for the block a month crochet along bamcal - join in the fun here 1 very honoured to be part of this great project the pattern is clearly written with round-by-round photographic illustrations and explanations of any tricky parts so can be tackled by a confident beginner some knowledge of basic techniques such as the magic_ring and invisible joining would be an advantage for the neatest finish but are not essential the motif works out at around 10 across in dk light worsted or 12 in aran worsted an optional extra surface round of petals is included at the end in case you want to make the design more floral maybe to fit in with earlier bamcal squares 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/2023-crochet-block-a-month-cal
